title: Set up the integral
text: With $$f(x)=x+4$$ and $$g(x)=3-\frac{x}{2}$$ over the given integral [1,4], we can complete the integral expression as $$A=\int_{1}^{4} x+4-3-\frac{x}{2} \,dx=\int_{1}^{4} \frac{3x}{2}+1 \,dx$$

title: Find the integral
